Factors are one of the two remaining types of data you'll encounter on a fairly regular basis. This post will show you how to use the [forcats](https://forcats.tidyverse.org/) tidyverse package in R so you'll know how to handle factors when you encounter them. Click [here](https://craig.rbind.io/post/2020-08-29-asgr-2-4-factors/) to read the full post.
